Reviews.Title: “what a shi....hole !”
Reviews.Author: Swiss_traveler_70
Reviews.Content: awful worst hotel impressions count arrival hole door mattress trampoline curtains nailed wall close middle dirty hair floor hair bed inside bed sheet souvenir guest upgraded suite 5th floor yeah wires coming wall 2 broken camp beds springs floor funny smell curtains closed oh yeah forgot mention told funny guy reception shocked surprised services provided recommend

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel in a very good place”
Reviews.Author: Andreia R
Reviews.Content: stayed friends pretty impressed quality weve read bad reviews booked stay thinking choice stay bad staff polite nerve scream friends hand clean tidy hot water clean towels breakfast included modest milk juice coffe croissants regular bread jams butter rest near termini station easy catch bus subway thats helpfull imagine overall recommend hotel looking foward spending willing stay modest

Reviews.Title: “Underwhelming in most regards”
Reviews.Author: PabloNeo
Reviews.Content: couple exceptional cleaning staff experience underwhelming breakfast complete waste time described functional bathroom slightly quality hotel hotel excessively warm airconditioning barely functioned yes meagre attempt cooling noisy deep sleepers awake im real note entice return

Reviews.Title: “Not the ideal holiday stay...”
Reviews.Author: Tahlia M
Reviews.Content: definitely book youre looking decent hotel experience lift absolutely tiny didnt fit luggage brother carry half flights stairs staff front desk disinterested helpful shower spurted water ridiculous contraption try five days didnt single hot lukewarm shower getting sick mum tried call hotel australia pass message refused hung proximity bus train terminal

Reviews.Title: “Quisisana hotel rome”
Reviews.Author: Rose C
Reviews.Content: front entrance nice hesitant elevator barely fit suitcases porter appeared slightly people leaving check bed grossed maybe left money ones sitting front desk hotel located shoddy close park car late night spot infront hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ants & Mould!”
Reviews.Author: ckearney78
Reviews.Content: please dont book stay hotelthe 3 minute walk bus terminal starters ants crawling carpet immediately carpet mould walls water leaking air conditioner mounted wall door sticky dirty taking shower water wall adjacent shower towel shower curtain mildew 13 tube tv didnt properlythe list goes upkept ruins forum condition hotel breakfast drink offered tea coffee lemonade fresh koolaid sugar water croissants box buns cornflakes

Reviews.Title: “It's a base centrally based, but don't expect much”
Reviews.Author: Ruthy75
Reviews.Content: reception staff appear friendly enought initial hiccup originally couldnt key offered double instead twin easily resolved clean beds comfertable tv broken light bedroom bedside lights shower curtain piece advice future guests showers cause water soon cold breakfast choice rolls sweet soft rolls packet stale tasting cereal offer life milk weak pot tea packet biscuits plus close main termini getting easy beware lot homeless people dark cheap band stay dont expect wont dissapointed

Reviews.Title: “Old and need some works done”
Reviews.Author: littleanna777
Reviews.Content: hotel looks nice pictures promising lovely spacious clean tiny clean wallpaper covered spots dirt breakfast joke bread roll hard brick croissant chewy nice breakfast decided stay bed overall hotel okay 3 nights budget location dodgy near train station close walk coleseum centre reception guy nice charged 5 euro internet half hour

Reviews.Title: “What a Dump!”
Reviews.Author: TheHotelAfficianado
Reviews.Content: terrible location looking nights rest decent meal morning staff search elsewhere bathroom hot water toilet sink couldnt bathroom comfort windows shut properly heard noise outside street freezing wallpaper coming walls bed sheets hair persons visit bathroom door knob shut properly course luggage accommodations onbut picture jsut wish photos remember dump truly condemned time ago

Reviews.Title: “abbiamo trovato bastanca bene”
Reviews.Author: nuru_10
Reviews.Content: hotel close vist center rome tram bus subway line time convenient airport enjoy city hotel

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, smoky and not terribly clean”
Reviews.Author: Fairw00d
Reviews.Content: stayed extended family reeked cigarette smoke offered glade antidote breakfast corn flakes overly sweetened croissants plastic wrapper ants breakfast table fathers hot water staff helped book nice fountain misinformation tour hard vatican etc chose proximity close train station

Reviews.Title: “Wow! Great hotel, great service, great location”
Reviews.Author: BethlovesRome
Reviews.Content: client care hotel phenomenal honest safe personal close walk termini metro 2 minute walk leave termini correct exit termini metro famous walking distance staff help hotel clean adequate hotel charming definitely hotel rome

Reviews.Title: “Very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: kazTipperaryIreland
Reviews.Content: home rome hotel def staff helpful friendly couldnt ive read bad reveiws totally true yes course rome yes modernised bit tvs workin didnt ours rome watch tv computers fake guy reception checked locations bit advise expect value money location cornor termini thanks sam staff holiday karen michael

Reviews.Title: “great hotel,great location amazing staff,simple and clean”
Reviews.Author: Gemma123046
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 13th 2010 3 nights travelled brother double triple clean throughout hotel breakfast morning satisfactory staff amazing helpful couldnt securing valuables giving advise directions amazing city hotel literally minutes terminal station ample reasonable prices hotel ignore review simple hotel clean location ticks box value money definitely stay
